Experience Letter

To Whom It May Concern,

This is to certify that {{ doc.employee_name }} (Employee ID: {{ doc.name }}) was employed with us as {{ doc.designation }} in the {{ doc.department or '' }} department from {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.date_of_joining) }} to {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.relieving_date or frappe.utils.nowdate()) }}.

During the employment period, {{ doc.employee_name }}'s conduct was satisfactory & he/she performed assigned duties to the expected standards.

We wish {{ doc.employee_name }} success in future endeavors.



Sincerely,

HR Manager

{{ doc.company or frappe.db.get_value('Company', {'is_default': 1}, 'company_name') }}
